title: Kiss wa 0 Toki wo Sugite kara
original_name: キスは０時を過ぎてから
sinopse:
On the day of her elder sister's wedding, Arisa's parents both die in a car accident. Afterwards, the beautiful man Arisa saw at the wedding appears before her. This handsome man is the son of the chairman of the Wang Yuan Corporation, and he suddenly asks for her hand in marriage...?!
(Source: Shoujo Kreuz)
